verses.verse: The Revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> gave<WG1325> unto him,<WG846> to show<WG1166> unto his<WG848> servants<WG1401> things which<WG3739> must<WG1163> shortly<WG1722> <WG5034> come to pass;<WG1096> and<WG2532> he sent<WG649> and signified<WG4591> it by<WG1223> his<WG848> angel<WG32> unto his<WG848> servant<WG1401> John:<WG2491>
Who<WG3739> bore record<WG3140> of the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> of the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG5037> of all things that<WG3745> he saw<WG1492>.

Blessed<WG3107> is he that reads<WG314>, and<WG2532> they that hear<WG191> the words<WG3056> of this prophecy<WG4394>, and<WG2532> keep<WG5083> those things which are written<WG1125> in it<WG1722>: <WG846> for<WG1063> the time<WG2540> is at hand<WG1451>.

John<WG2491> to the<WG1577> seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577> which are in<WG1722> Asia<WG773>: Grace<WG5485> be to you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> peace<WG1515>, from<WG575> him which is<WG5607>, and<WG2532> which was<WG2258>, and<WG2532> which is to come<WG2064>; and<WG2532> from<WG575> the<WG4151> seven<WG2033> Spirits<WG4151> which<WG3739> are<WG2076> before<WG1799> his<WG846> throne<WG2362>;

And<WG2532> from<WG575> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, who is the faithful<WG4103> witness<WG3144>, and the first born<WG4416> of<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, and<WG2532> the prince<WG758> of the kings<WG935> of the earth<WG1093>. To him that loved<WG25> us<WG2248>, and<WG2532> washed<WG3068> us<WG2248> from<WG575> our<WG2257> sins<WG266> in<WG1722> his own<WG846> blood<WG129>,

And<WG2532> has made<WG4160> us<WG2248> kings<WG935> and<WG2532> priests<WG2409> to God<WG2316> and<WG2532> his<WG846> Father<WG3962>; to him<WG846> be glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> dominion<WG2904> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

Behold<WG2400>, he comes<WG2064> with<WG3326> clouds<WG3507>; and<WG2532> every<WG3956> eye<WG3788> shall see<WG3700> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> they also which<WG3748> pierced<WG1574> him<WG846>: and<WG2532> all<WG3956> kindreds<WG5443> of the earth<WG1093> shall wail<WG2875> because of<WG1909> him<WG846>. Even so<WG3483>, Amen<WG281>.

I<WG1473> am<WG1510> Alpha<WG1> and<WG2532> Omega<WG5598>, the beginning<WG746> and<WG2532> the ending<WG5056>, says<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962>, which is<WG5607>, and<WG2532> which was<WG2258>, and<WG2532> which is to come<WG2064>, the Almighty<WG3841>.

I<WG1473> John<WG2491>, who also<WG2532> am your<WG5216> brother<WG80>, and<WG2532> companion<WG4791> in<WG1722> tribulation<WG2347>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the kingdom<WG932> and<WG2532> patience<WG5281> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, was<WG1096> on<WG1722> the isle<WG3520> that is called<WG2564> Patmos<WG3963>, for<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> for<WG1223> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

I was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151> on<WG1722> the<WG2250> Lord<WG2960>'s day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191> behind<WG3694> me<WG3450> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, as<WG5613> of a trumpet<WG4536>,

Saying<WG3004>, I<WG1473> am<WG1510> Alpha<WG1> and<WG2532> Omega<WG5598>, the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the last<WG2078>: and<WG2532>, What<WG3739> you see<WG991>, write<WG1125> in<WG1519> a book<WG975>, and<WG2532> send<WG3992> it to the seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577> which are<WG773> in<WG1722> Asia<WG773>; to<WG1519> Ephesus<WG2181>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Smyrna<WG4667>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Pergamos<WG4010>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Thyatira<WG2363>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Sardis<WG4554>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Philadelphia<WG5359>, and<WG2532> to<WG1519> Laodicea<WG2993>.

And<WG2532> I turned<WG1994> to see<WG991> the voice<WG5456> that<WG3748> spoke<WG2980> with<WG3326> me<WG1700>. And<WG2532> having turned<WG1994>, I saw<WG1492> seven<WG2033> golden candlesticks<WG5552>;

And<WG2532> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the seven<WG2033> candlesticks<WG3087> one like<WG3664> to the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444>, clothed<WG1746> with a garment down to the foot<WG4158>, and<WG2532> belted<WG4024> about<WG4314> the breasts<WG3149> with a golden<WG5552> belt<WG2223>.

His<WG846> head<WG2776> and<WG2532> his hair<WG2359> were white<WG3022> like<WG5616> wool<WG2053>, as<WG5613> white<WG3022> as snow<WG5510>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788> were as<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire<WG1161>;

And<WG2532> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> like<WG3664> fine brass<WG5474>, as if<WG5613> they burned<WG4448> in<WG1722> a furnace<WG2575>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> voice<WG5456> as<WG5613> the sound<WG5456> of<WG5204> many<WG4183> waters<WG5204>.

And<WG2532> he had<WG2192> in<WG1722> his<WG846> right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> seven<WG2033> stars<WG792>: and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> went<WG1607> a sharp<WG3691> twoedged<WG1366> sword<WG4501>: and<WG2532> his<WG846> appearance<WG3799> was as<WG5613> the sun<WG2246> shines<WG5316> in<WG1722> his<WG846> strength<WG1411>.

And<WG2532> when<WG3753> I saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, I fell<WG4098> at<WG4314> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> as<WG5613> dead<WG3498>. And<WG2532> he laid<WG2007> his<WG846> right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> upon<WG1909> me<WG1691>, saying<WG3004> to me<WG3427>, Fear<WG5399> not<WG3361>; I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the last<WG2078>:

I am he that lives<WG2198>, and<WG2532> was<WG1096> dead<WG3498>; and<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, I am<WG1510> alive<WG2198> for<WG1519><WG99999> evermore<WG165>, Amen<WG281>; and<WG2532> have<WG2192> the keys<WG2807> of hell<WG86> and<WG2532> of death<WG2532>.

Write<WG1125> the things which<WG3739> you have seen<WG1492>, and<WG2532> the things which<WG3739> are<WG1526>, and<WG2532> the things which<WG3739> shall<WG3195> be<WG1096><WG99999> hereafter<WG5023>;

The mystery<WG3466> of the seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> which<WG3739> you saw<WG1492> in<WG1909> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>, and<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> golden<WG5552> candlesticks<WG3087>. The seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> are<WG1526> the angels<WG32> of the seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577>: and<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> candlesticks<WG3087> which<WG3739> you saw<WG1492> are<WG1526> the seven<WG2033> churches<WG1577>.
